tasks.title: Critical Incident Runbooks
deliverables: Runbooks for gateway auth failures, socket disconnect storms, kafka lag spikes, and dashboard data outages.
Step-by-step diagnosis commands and rollback decision trees for docker-based environments.
Ownership map for service teams and escalation contacts.
acceptance_criteria: Each alert has linked runbook id and clear first-response steps.
Runbooks include verification step after mitigation.

tasks.title: Alert Noise Reduction And Routing
deliverables: Alert severity matrix and dedup rules (page, ticket, info).
Multi-window burn-rate alerts for SLO breaches.
Suppression windows for planned maintenance with audit trail.
acceptance_criteria: No duplicate pages for same root incident within configured cooldown.
Critical incidents page on-call within target response time.

tasks.title: Observability Verification Gates In CI And E2E
deliverables: Smoke tests that validate metrics endpoint reachability and trace emission in docker test runs.
E2E assertions for correlation id continuity across gateway -> socket -> kafka -> persistence.
Release gate that fails if required telemetry contracts regress.
acceptance_criteria: Telemetry regressions block release in CI.
New services/events cannot ship without observability contract checks.

tasks.title: GameDay Drills And Incident Metrics Governance
deliverables: Quarterly GameDay scenarios for auth refresh failures, socket reconnect storms, kafka lag spikes, and monitoring data staleness.
Incident KPI framework: MTTD, MTTR, false-positive rate, and alert-actionability score.
Post-incident template with required telemetry artifacts (trace ids, correlation ids, key logs, affected SLOs).
Corrective-action tracking model that links incidents back to task backlog items.
acceptance_criteria: Each GameDay scenario is executed in containerized non-production environment with recorded outcomes.
Incident reports include measurable KPI deltas and assigned remediation ownership.
Recurring alert-noise issues are traceable to documented tuning actions.
